sentences.sentence: His prose has a buckram quality.
sentences.translation: 他的散文有拘泥的特性。

sentences.sentence: Figured out all the maths and cut a piece of buckram the right size.
sentences.translation: 发挥一下数学天分吧，裁一条大小合适的纸带来。

sentences.sentence: Canvas: Thick book-binders' cloth having greater durability than ordinary cloth but not so strong as buckram.
sentences.translation: 帆布：美装订用的厚布。较普通的布耐用，但不及“书面布”的结实。
